0: I joined trip advisor specifically to leave a comment on this hotel
After staying in many budget hotels throughout the USA on a 5 week trip I ended at this hotel in New York
I stayed here in march as part of a college trip from uk
Not bad hotel if you are on a school trip but would not return
I chaperoned my daughters class trip and we demanded to be switched to a different room three times
So convenient and easy when traveling to the city by anything other than car and also for getting around during your trip
There were an amazing number of couples and families from all parts of the world
but it was dealt with and never experienced anything like that again for the remainder of my week long trip
But the rooms did not spoil are holiday New York amazing
I have to go regularly for family and friends and fun
